```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#plot_ly(data = iris, type = 'scatter', 
#        x = ~Sepal.Length, 
#        y = ~Sepal.Width, 
#        color = ~Species#, size = ~Petal.Length
#        ) %>%
#        layout(title = list(text = "-= My first plotly graph =-", 
#                            font = list(famioly = 'Times New Roman')))
plot_ly(data = iris,
        type = 'scatter') %>% 
        add_trace(x = ~Sepal.Length,
                  y = ~Sepal.Width, 
                  color = ~Species,
                  opacity = 1,
                  marker = list(sizemode = 'diameter', 
                                size = ~Petal.Length*3)) %>%  
        layout(legend= list(itemsizing='constant')) %>%
        layout(title = list(text = 'MY FIRST PLOTLY GRAPH', font = list(size = 30)), 
               plot_bgcolor = "#e5ecf6") %>% 
        layout(autosize = T, 
               margin = list(l = 50,r = 50,b = 50,t = 50,pad = 4)) %>%
        layout(xaxis = list(range = c(min(iris$Sepal.Length), max(iris$Sepal.Length))),
               yaxis = list(range = c(min(iris$Sepal.Width), max(iris$Sepal.Width))))

```
